instructionSteps.description:
To proceed with the Microsoft Sentinel setup

1. Click the **Deploy to Azure** button below. 

	

[![Deploy To Azure](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://portal.azure.com/#create/Microsoft.Template/uri/https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Frvirjoghe-bd%2Fazure-sentinel-test%2Fmain%2Fazuredeploy_Rvtest_API_FunctionApp.json)

2. **Please note that after the successful deployment, the system pulls Activity Log data every 1 minute by default.**
